thread.title: 3M exploring sale or spinoff of health software unit
thread.title_full: 3M exploring sale or spinoff of health software unit | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: 3M exploring sale or spinoff of health software unit
text:
Post-it notes maker 3M Co ( MMM.N ) said it was exploring a sale or a spinoff of its unit that makes software for hospitals, among other strategic alternatives.
3M Health Information Systems, a unit of the company's healthcare business, had trailing 12-month revenue of about $730 million, 3M said on Thursday.
(Reporting by Ankit Ajmera in Bengaluru; Editing by Kirti Pandey)
